get.description: Attributes of a single list, including data about its active revision.

parameters.name: _attributes
parameters.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the recommendation list is, was, or will be active.

numberRevisions.description: Number of all revisions of this recommendation list.

activeRevision.description: Information on the active revision of this recommendation list, or null.

id.description: Identifier of the currently active revision.

title.description: The language specific name assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the revision is, was, or will be active.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

get.description: Search for recommendation lists, delivering an array of recommendation lists matching the specified filter criteria. The data provided for each recommendation list includes the currently active revision (or null in case no active revision exists).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Restricts the search to recommendation lists, which contain the provided string in their name attribute. The filter is a case-insensitive substring match.

parameters.name: onlyActive
parameters.description: Restrict the search to recommendation lists, which are currently active (e.g., current date is before the recommendation list's activeRange.end date). If set to false, recommendation lists will be returned regardless of their state.

parameters.name: _attributes
parameters.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the recommendation list is active or has been active.

numberRevisions.description: Number of all revisions of this recommendation list.

activeRevision.description: Information on the active revision of this recommendation list, or null.

id.description: Identifier of the currently active revision.

title.description: The language specific name assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the revision is, was, or will be active.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

parameters.name: _attributes
parameters.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

recommendationList.description: The recommendation list to which this revision belongs.

items.description: Type assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

types.description: Set of types assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision. The customer maintains a list of valid types for all of its recommendation lists.

title.description: Title assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

description.description: Description assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the revision is, was, or will be active.

instrument.description: Instrument to which the recommendation list points, as of the given revision.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

post.summary: List of revisions of a recommendation list.
post.description: List of revisions of a recommendation list, excluding the elements of each revision.

data.description: The data member contains the request's primary data.

items.description: Restrict the result list to specific revisions. Each identifier refers to a revision of the recommendation list referenced by idList.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Restrict the result list to revisions which have been active during the specified time range.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the request.

items.description: Type assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

types.description: Set of types assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision. The customer maintains a list of valid types for all of its recommendation lists.

title.description: Title assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

description.description: Description assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the revision is, was, or will be active.

instrument.description: Instrument to which the recommendation list points, as of the given revision.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

get.summary: Search for revisions of a recommendation list.
get.description: Search for revisions of a recommendation list.

parameters.name: idNotation
parameters.description: Restrict the search to revisions containing an element associated with the identified notation.

parameters.name: idInstrument
parameters.description: Restrict the search to revisions pointing to the identified instrument.

parameters.name: _attributes
parameters.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

recommendationList.description: The recommendation list to which this revision belongs.

items.description: Type assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

types.description: Set of types assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision. The customer maintains a list of valid types for all of its recommendation lists.

title.description: Title assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

description.description: Description assigned to the recommendation list as of the given revision.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

activeRange.description: Time range during which the revision is, was, or will be active.

instrument.description: Instrument to which the recommendation list points, as of the given revision.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

get.summary: List of elements of a given revision.
get.description: List of elements of a given revision.

parameters.name: _attributes
parameters.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

data.description: List of elements sorted by position.

hasNotationData.description:
Attributes referred to by the notation identifier, beyond notation.instrument.customName, are available.

If this flag is false, it indicates that some notation data for this element is no longer available because the notation may have expired. For answers without notation data, the members position, instrument.customName, weight, description and recommendationClass are retained.

symbol.description: The symbol of the notation. It is a market-specific code to identify the notation. Which characters can be part of a symbol depends on the market. If a market does not define a proprietary symbol, but uses a different identifier (for example, the ISIN or the WKN) to identify notations, no symbol will be set for the notations of that market.

isin.description: International Securities Identification Number of the instrument.

customName.description: Customer specific name of the instrument.

type.description: Instrument type as defined by FactSet Digital Solutions. Instrument types are arranged in a hierarchy, with level 1 representing the most coarse granularity and further levels successively refining the granularity (see MDG category system 18).

weight.description: Weight of this list element. If set for at least one list element, the sum off all weights of an element list must be 1.

recommendationClass.description: Customer-defined recommendation class of the element.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for all errors (400 ... 599 error codes)

ErrorObject.description: The errors member contains additional information about a failed request.

details.description: A human-readable, unstructured explanation specific to this occurrence of the failure.

encryptedDetails.description: Base64-encoded, internal details about the error, in addition to "details".

type.description: Internal error type of the Foundation API protocol.

attribute.description: For a validation error, a reference to the request parameter that failed validation; otherwise, an empty array.

name.description: Element of the path denoting the request parameter.

index.description: If the attribute "name" designates an array, index of the array element; otherwise the special value -1.

AttributesMember.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

code.description: The HTTP status code of the response, mirroring the code from the Status-Line of the HTTP response message (see [RFC2616] section 6.1).

StatusObject.description: The status member contains the status code of the response.

CursorBasedPaginationOutputObject.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy.

total.description: Total number of entries in the result set.

isEstimatedTotal.description: Flag indicating that the value of `total` is estimated.

next.description: The next cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination, otherwise `null`.

previous.description: The previous cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination. If a previous cursor position is not supported or available, `previous` is `null`.

CursorBasedPaginationOutputObjectWithout.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy; a total element count is not supported.

next.description: The next cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination, otherwise `null`.

previous.description: The previous cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination. If a previous cursor position is not supported or available, `previous` is `null`.

OffsetBasedPaginationOutputObject.description: Pagination attributes for the offset-based pagination strategy.

total.description: Total number of entries in the result set.

isEstimatedTotal.description: Flag indicating that the value of "total" is estimated.

OffsetBasedPaginationOutputObjectWithout.description: Pagination attributes for the offset-based pagination strategy; a total element count is not supported.

hasNext.description: Flag indicating that a subsequent request with the same parameters, except that the parameter `pagination.offset` is incremented by `pagination.limit`, would yield additional results.

isPartial.description: Flag indicating that the response is a possibly incomplete array or an object containing a possibly incomplete array, due to hitting a processing time limit. If `true`, some matching results might be missing from the array, or elements for matching results might be incorrectly included (for example, when priority sorting would have removed the element). Depending on the use case, such a response may be unsuitable.

PartialOutputObject.description: Object denoting that the endpoint response is possibly incomplete.
